p: Spore density in soil and colonization of S. canadensis roots were high for G. geosporum and G. versiforme in the absence of AC but were reduced ( P<0.05) when AC was added ( Fig. 4). Addition of AC increased ( P<0.05) the spore density for G. mosseae and G. diaphanum ( Fig. 4A). By contrast, the addition of AC did not significantly affect ( P>0.05) spore density or colonization for G. etunicatum ( Fig. 4).
